title: This is me : foundation for young Australians (July 2009) : Digital Storytelling project
creator_contributor_role: Australia. Dept. of Education, Employment and Workplace Relations, partner
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.

abstract: Young Indigenous Australians talk about what inspires, encourages and shapes them.
description: Six young Indigenous Australians look back and reflect on the things, events and people that have inspired, encouraged and, ultimately, shaped them into the youth leaders they have become. While telling different stories, they all have some common themes, of family, connection to their land and culture and spirituality. The stories brim with optimism and uplift and inspire in much the same way that these young people were inspired by the stories of their ancestors.
